title: May Metal Type News
content:
The May edition of the Metal Type newsletter is now out.

I’m pleased to say that this month’s video is an “outside broadcast” - I filmed it in York city centre, in Dean’s Park in the grounds of the historical Gothic cathedral known as the “Minster.”

Fans of bird-song may also be interested - they seemed to be in good voice throughout the filming!

There’s been plenty of new and interesting material added to the site during April.

Click the link below to take a look:  
 [http://www.metaltype.co.uk/rail/clicks/click.php?id=17](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924064756/http:/www.metaltype.co.uk/rail/clicks/click.php?id=17 "http://www.metaltype.co.uk/rail/clicks/click.php?id=17")

=============================

METAL TYPE CLASSIFIEDS

Don’t forget you can always place a free ad on Metal Type.

[http://www.metaltype.co.uk/cgi-bin/suite/classifieds/classifieds.cgi](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924064756/http:/www.metaltype.co.uk/cgi-bin/suite/classifieds/classifieds.cgi "http://www.metaltype.co.uk/cgi-bin/suite/classifieds/classifieds.cgi")

==============================

All the Best  
Dave Hughes

 [‹ Typeface: a film by Justine Nagan](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924064756/http:/typophile.com/node/44852 "Go to previous forum topic") [I hate Microsoft Word ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924064756/http:/typophile.com/node/44804 "Go to next forum topic")
author: MetalType
